sentences.sContent: He was one of the most powerful men in Bohemia.
sentences.sCn: 他是波希米亚最有权势的人物之一。

sentences.sContent: a very influential and powerful family
...As she explored new interests and developed new potentials，Leah felt powerful internally...
...1 felt powerful because 1 broke through my own limitations...
...Google can give us the powerful illusion that all questions have definite answers...
...But functioning fireplaces remain to this day a powerful selling point in a house or apartment...
...Rousseau wrote in his Confessions that while he considered tears the most powerful expression of love...
...But they have a powerful hold on many people nonetheless...
...these useful and powerful communication tools have made it much faster...

words.tran: 借影响有权势人物以操纵权力的
有动力装置的；以…为动力的
无力的；[劳经] 无能力的，无权的
功率；力量；能力；政权；势力；[数] 幂
促进（power的过去分词）；给…提供动力
激励；供以动力；使…有力量

trans.tranOther: a powerful person, organization, group etc is able to control and influence events and other people’s actions
